array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: I know what you're here for.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: I've had so many contracts over my head, I have lost count.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: Are you one more of these no-brain hitmen? Or are you actually Someone?

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: I can see you shaking, so I'll go with the latter.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: I'll tell you right away, they've taken down all my security, and I'm no fighter.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: Now that you're here, allow me at least some good final words before the unevitable, will you?

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: They're trying to make me the villain of this story.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: I guess sitting alone in the dark in my office while people walk around with my tech in their brain paints this picture, I'll give you that.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: But you tell me, is it that bad to make profit off of people's pain if you make it disappear in the process?

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: As I said, you're not the first one to come for me.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: *looks around him*

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: But would it change anything?

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: You think that killing me would have any impact on the world?

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: I'm just one man, I'm not Neurotech.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: What's done is done. If I die, someone else will get my spot, and they'll just move on with the technology.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: And who are you to decide of my fate?

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: Does that make you any better than me?

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: How many people have you saved? Because I know I have saved quite a lot.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: How many people have you killed? I know some would say I'm responsible of the death of many as well.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: But my fate, as a human, is in your hands now.

array.name: Eric Van Der Waals
array.sentence: Do what you think is right, I know I have.
